description: This Java file contains Data Transfer Object (DTO) classes used for authentication endpoints, defining request and response structures for login and registration processes.

classes.name: AuthDtos
classes.description: Container class for authentication-related DTOs including registration request, login request, and authentication response.

classes.name: RegisterRequest
classes.description: DTO for user registration request containing email, display name, and password.

classes.name: LoginRequest
classes.description: DTO for user login request containing email and password.

classes.name: AuthResponse
classes.description: DTO for authentication responses including a message, user ID, and display name.

methods.name: AuthResponse
methods.description: Constructor for creating an AuthResponse object with a message, user ID, and display name.
